title: saved_tensors attribute for grad_fn
body_html:
Hi,

This script for graph visualization worked on previous versions: https://github.com/szagoruyko/functional-zoo/blob/master/visualize.py
For the latest version the visualized graph shows just variables, but not saved tensors. Could you please advise how can saved tensors for neural network computational graph be accessed now (before we could use attribute saved_tensors in grad_fn)?

Thanks,
Dmitry

body:
Hi,

This script for graph visualization worked on previous versions: https://github.com/szagoruyko/functional-zoo/blob/master/visualize.py
For the latest version the visualized graph shows just variables, but not saved tensors. Could you please advise how can saved tensors for neural network computational graph be accessed now (before we could use attribute saved_tensors in grad_fn)?
